title: Google pixel 3 screen flickering green/flashing
content: I've only had my pixel 3 4 days and I starting seeing the screen would flash then this went away now its constantly flickering and flashing and I can't work out why I've seen other people have this problem and tbh ye I'm annoyed googling can't even anda phone that works properly and they created android can someone please help me with this thanks in advance?
